title: Energizer Holdings - What's the other font?
content:
The font for the word "Energizer" looks like it's Helvetica LT Condensed Black but I have no idea what the other font is. I've asked for a better copy of their logo but they keep sending me tiny, useless images (not vectors).

Any help would be greatly appreciated, thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [EnergizerHoldings.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417210703/http:/typophile.com/files/EnergizerHoldings.png) | 170.03 KB |
author: MikBe

comments.content: “Energizer” is probably custom, reminds of Impact, though. The rest is [Interstate](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417210703/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/interstate/).

Thank you SO much!

The Energizer is definitely some form of Helvetica. I was able to use LT Condensed Black Oblique with just a little tracking and kerning the sides of the "i." It matches almost perfectly. (Blue is my version over the black original).

Thanks again!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417210703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FoundFont_3559.jpg)
